name: The Otherworld Massage School: Chapter 1
description:
Just beyond the pine trees is an enchanted school. You won't find any "potters" or citizens of OZ, but you will find the most gifted massage therapists of the Otherworld.

The clientele is what you would find at any spa: Pregnant orcs, skeletons with a funny bone, pro-wrestlers, the normal ilk. Every floor in the school full of hidden Easter eggs and jokes for you to discover.

In the first chapter of this RPG adventure, you begin your first year at the school. There, you must treat a cast of characters. But watch out! If you trigger their contraindications, you might end up dead, or worse, expelled!

For licensed LMTs, this game can be played for continuing education credit. Under many state boards, this qualifies as 1-2 hours of online study. To verify that the game has been played, players will take an in-game quiz that becomes available after completing the game's content. In order to be issued a certificate of completion, the code needs to be submitted to the website listed in-game, along with a small additional fee.

This games is not meant to treat, diagnose, or cure any disease. It is for educational and entertainment purposes only.

Also, this is my first completed game! So feel free to post comments and suggestions.
